GxClientModels

Class GxClientFilterAbstractModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • GxClientModels.GxClientFilterAbstractModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GxClientFilterModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GxClientFilterBooleanModel, GxClientFilterCombinedModel, GxClientFilterSetFilterModel, GxClientFilterSimpleModel

    public class GxClientFilterAbstractModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements GxClientFilterModel
    A generic abstract implementation for the GxClientFilterModel interface
    Author:
    Hyyan Abo Fakher

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BBjString apply()
      Apply the filter This method only compose the model and send it to the client On the client the new model will be displayed on the filter panel but it will not be applied on the data.
      BBjString apply(BBjNumber send!)
      Apply the filter This method will only compose the model and send it to the client in case `send!` is true.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public BBjString apply(BBjNumber send!)
        Apply the filter This method will only compose the model and send it to the client in case `send!` is true. On the client the new model will be displayed on the filter panel but it will not be applied on the data. To execute the model on the client you need to call `execute(1)`
        Specified by:
        apply in interface GxClientFilterModel
        Returns:
        BBjString The generated js code used to apply the model
        See Also:
        GxClientFilterModel.execute()

      • apply

        public BBjString apply()
        Apply the filter This method only compose the model and send it to the client On the client the new model will be displayed on the filter panel but it will not be applied on the data. To execute the model on the client you need to call `execute(1)`
        Specified by:
        apply in interface GxClientFilterModel
        Returns:
        BBjString The generated js code used to apply the model
        See Also:
        GxClientFilterModel.execute()

      • execute

        public BBjString execute(BBjNumber send!)
        Tell the grid to refresh rows based on the filter. the filter does not do this automatically in case multiple filters are going to get set.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface GxClientFilterModel
        Returns:
        BBjString The generated js code used to execute the model on the client

      • execute

        public BBjString execute()
        Tell the grid to refresh rows based on the filter. the filter does not do this automatically in case multiple filters are going to get set.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface GxClientFilterModel

      • update

        public BBjString update()
        Update the filter on the client and execute it.
        Specified by:
        update in interface GxClientFilterModel
        Returns:
        BBjString the js code used

      • isFilterActive

        public BBjNumber isFilterActive()
        Check if the filter is action or not
        #API
        Specified by:
        isFilterActive in interface GxClientFilterModel
        Returns:
        BBjNumber true when action , false otherwise
